snippet.title: Europe's version of 'American Idol' a joke
snippet.description:
* Normally, its viewers don't associate "Eurovision" with global politics. The annual singing show is a camp retread of the cultural wasteland of the 1970s -- all crashing ballads, gaudy europop and singing penguins. Britain has signaled its contempt for the contest by sending 76-year-old Engelbert Humperdinck as its repres...
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/25/opinion/stanley-eurovision/index.html

snippet.title: Denmark wins Eurovision Song Contest
snippet.description:
* Emmelie de Forest carried Denmark to triumph early Sunday in the Eurovision Song Contest, an annual musical spectacle known for its combination of over-the-top costumes, kitsch pop songs and international rivalries.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/05/18/world/europe/eurovision-song-contest/index.html

snippet.title: Suecia gana el Festival de la Canción de Eurovisión por quinta vez
snippet.description:
* (CNN) – Eurovisión, el evento televisivo no deportivo más visto del mundo, tiene nuevo ganador. La canción Euphoria de la cantante Loreen fue elegida victoriosa por encima de las de otros 25 países. “Quiero decirles que los amo mucho. Gracias por creer...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2012/05/26/suecia-gana-el-festival-de-la-cancion-de-eurovision-por-quinta-vez/

snippet.title: Eurovisión, el festival musical que este año se realiza en medio de controversia en Azerbaiyán
snippet.description:
* (CNN) – Artistas de 26 países se preparan este sábado para participar en el Festival de la Canción de Eurovisión, un concurso de talentos que este año será realizado en Azerbaiyán en medio de controversia. El evento anual atrae una audiencia estimada...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2012/05/26/eurovision-un-festival-musical-que-este-ano-se-realiza-en-medio-de-controversia-en-azerbaiyan/

snippet.title: Sweden snags top prize in Eurovision Song Contest
snippet.description:
* A Swedish performer emerged victorious in the Eurovision Song Contest on Saturday, beating out competition from 25 other nations.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/26/showbiz/eurovision-song-contest/index.html

snippet.title: Politics nothing new for Eurovision Song Contest
snippet.description:
* The finals of the Eurovision Song Contest will be held Saturday, and 125 million people are expected to tune in. The competition is one of the longest-running television programs in the world, having taken place every year since 1956. Countries from...
http://globalpublicsquare.blogs.cnn.com/2012/05/25/politics-nothing-new-for-eurovision-song-contest/

snippet.title: Why fragile eurozone nations may want to lose Eurovision
snippet.description:
* London (CNN) – Much of the beleaguered eurozone will grind to a halt Saturday for the Eurovision Song Contest, that...
http://business.blogs.cnn.com/2012/05/25/why-fragile-eurozone-nations-may-want-to-lose-eurovision/

snippet.title: Why Eurovision song contest should not be held in Azerbaijan
snippet.description:
* For some, this week in Europe will be consumed by a singing contest. Eurovision. A contest where musical ambassadors from all over Europe and beyond come together as an instrument for political jockeying... I mean to showcase their talent in a performance of free expression.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/25/opinion/euro-azerbaijan-opinion/index.html
